<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This class represents an XCOFF &#96;Control Section&#96;, more commonly referred to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as a csect. A csect represents the smallest possible unit of data/code which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be relocated as a single block. A csect can either be:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) Initialized: The Type will be XTY&#95;SD, and the symbols inside the csect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    will have a label definition representing their offset within the csect.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) Uninitialized: The Type will be XTY&#95;CM, it will contain a single symbol,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    and may not contain label definitions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3) An external reference providing a symbol table entry for a symbol</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    contained in another XCOFF object file. External reference csects are not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    implemented yet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">MCSectionXCOFF final : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection/#ad2c130ecb0e15e740bfad7eb61eb061e">MCSection</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
